tossup_question: -   –  Name all of the following statements that are true for isothermal reversible expansions of ideal gases: 1) All heat flow into the system is converted into work; 2) The gas increases in pressure; 3) This process is part of Carnot’s cycle.
bonus_question: -   –  Identify all of the following three statements that are true regarding a chemical reaction where delta G is negative and the change in entropy is negative: 1) Requires energy; 2) Is exergonic; 3) Increases the disorder in a system.
